item.title: internet protocols
item.description: Internet protocols are sets of rules that enable communication and data exchange across the internet. There are many types of internet protocols for different purposes and functions.

item.title: Open AI competitors
item.description: OpenAI’s main competitors in the field of artificial intelligence and machine learning include companies like Google, Facebook, Amazon, Microsoft, IBM, Baidu, and Tencent.

item.title: SQL subsets
item.description: SQL has several subsets that are used for different purposes: DDL (Data Definition Language): It defines the data structure and schema of the database.
